statements: SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_permits;
SELECT company_name, permit_type, expiration_date FROM waste_disposal_permits;
SELECT permit_id, company_name FROM waste_disposal_permits WHERE permit_type = 'Hazardous';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_permits WHERE permit_date >= '2021-01-01' AND expiration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT company_name, permit_type FROM waste_disposal_permits ORDER BY permit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_permits WHERE permit_type='TypeA' ORDER BY permit_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, permit_date FROM waste_disposal_permits WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_permits WHERE company_name LIKE '%Company%' ORDER BY permit_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT company_name) AS num_companies FROM waste_disposal_permits;
SELECT permit_id, company_name, permit_date FROM waste_disposal_permits WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_permits;
SELECT company_name, permit_issued_date FROM waste_permits ORDER BY permit_issued_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM waste_companies WHERE location='City1';
SELECT permit_id, company_name FROM waste_permits WHERE permit_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM waste_companies ORDER BY company_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_permits WHERE permit_id = 100;
SELECT company_name, permit_issued_date FROM waste_permits;
SELECT company_id, company_name, location FROM waste_companies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT waste_permits.permit_id, waste_companies.company_name FROM waste_permits JOIN waste_companies ON waste_permits.permit_id = waste_companies.permit_id;
SELECT waste_companies.company_name, waste_permits.permit_issued_date FROM waste_companies LEFT JOIN waste_permits ON waste_companies.permit_id = waste_permits.permit_id;
SELECT * FROM WastePermits;
SELECT permit_id, company_name, permit_date FROM WastePermits WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM WastePermits ORDER BY permit_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) FROM WastePermits GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT WastePermits.permit_id, WastePermits.company_name, WasteLocations.location_name FROM WastePermits JOIN WasteLocations ON WastePermits.permit_id = WasteLocations.permit_id;
SELECT * FROM WastePermits;
SELECT company_name, permit_date FROM WastePermits ORDER BY permit_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, permit_date, expiry_date FROM WastePermits WHERE company_name = 'ABC Company';
SELECT company_name, permit_date, location_name, address FROM WastePermits JOIN WasteLocations ON WastePermits.permit_id = WasteLocations.permit_id;
SELECT permit_id, change_date, change_description FROM PermitHistory WHERE permit_id = 123 ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WastePermits;
SELECT company_name, permit_type FROM WastePermits ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT permit_id, company_name, permit_type FROM WastePermits WHERE permit_type = 'Hazardous Waste';
SELECT * FROM WasteCompanies WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT history_id, permit_id, status FROM PermitHistory WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM WastePermits;
SELECT company_name, permit_type FROM WastePermits ORDER BY issue_date DESC;

SELECT wp.permit_id, wc.company_name, ph.status FROM WastePermits wp JOIN WasteCompanies wc ON wp.company_name = wc.company_name JOIN PermitHistory ph ON wp.permit_id = ph.permit_id WHERE ph.issue_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PermitHistory WHERE status = 'Active' AND issue_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY issue_date ASC;
SELECT ra.authority_name, ra.region, wc.company_name FROM RegulatoryAuthorities ra JOIN WasteCompanies wc ON ra.region = 'North' AND wc.contact_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY ra.authority_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_permits;
SELECT company_name, permit_type, issue_date FROM waste_permits ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT holder_name, contact_email FROM permit_holders WHERE permit_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM permit_locations WHERE postal_code = '12345';
SELECT document_type, document_url FROM permit_documents LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM permit_holders WHERE holder_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY contact_email DESC;
SELECT holder_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM permit_holders WHERE permit_id = 1001;
SELECT permit_id, company_name, permit_type FROM waste_permits WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM permit_locations WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY location_name ASC, state DESC;
SELECT holder_name, contact_email, city, state FROM permit_holders JOIN permit_locations ON permit_holders.permit_id = permit_locations.permit_id WHERE state = 'California';
